description: Updates the criteria and values for the specified archive rule.

parameters.name: analyzerName
parameters.description: The name of the analyzer to update the archive rules for.

parameters.name: ruleName
parameters.description: The name of the rule to update.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: A filter to match for the rules to update. Only rules that match the filter are updated. (string) --- (dict) --- The criteria to use in the filter that defines the archive rule. For more information on available filter keys, see IAM Access Analyzer filter keys. eq (list) --- An 'equals' operator to match for the filter used to create the rule. (string) --- neq (list) --- A 'not equals' operator to match for the filter used to create the rule. (string) --- contains (list) --- A 'contains' operator to match for the filter used to create the rule. (string) --- exists (boolean) --- An 'exists' operator to match for the filter used to create the rule.

nested_params.name: eq
nested_params.description: An 'equals' operator to match for the filter used to create the rule.

nested_params.name: neq
nested_params.description: A 'not equals' operator to match for the filter used to create the rule.

nested_params.name: contains
nested_params.description: A 'contains' operator to match for the filter used to create the rule.

nested_params.name: exists
nested_params.description: An 'exists' operator to match for the filter used to create the rule.

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: A client token. This field is autopopulated if not provided.
